sense.gloss: superficially polite but actually rude, rude under a veneer of politeness, courteous on the surface but insolent at heart
overdone politeness, polite to a fault, feigned politeness
to have a surreptitious sexual relationship with, to have an illicit love affair with

sdata.j: ↑耐↑↓た↓えがたきは、↑度↑↓ど↓を↑越↑↓こ↓した↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑慇懃↑↓いんぎん↓さだ。
sdata.e: What is hard to put up with is his over-politeness.

sdata.j: あいつの↑慇懃無礼↑↓いんぎんぶれい↓なものの↑言↑↓い↓い↑方↑↓かた↓、↑思↑↓おも↓い↑出↑↓だ↓すだけで↑不愉快↑↓ふゆかい↓になるよ。
sdata.e: I find just the memory of his overly polite patronizing manner really offensive.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓の↑銀行員↑↓ぎんこういん↓の↑態度↑↓たいど↓はなんと↑慇懃無礼↑↓いんぎんぶれい↓なことか。↑何様↑↓なにさま↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓ってるんだ。
sdata.e: These bank employees seem so politely insolent lately. I wonder what's behind it.
